name: Common Utilities
description: Comprehensive development utilities with modern CLI tools, shell configurations, and customizable tool bundles. Includes modern shell tools (starship, zoxide, eza, bat), web development tools, networking utilities, container tools, and system utilities with granular configuration options.

defaultShell.description: Default shell to set for the user

installBat.description: Install bat (modern cat with syntax highlighting)

webDevBundle.description: Install web development bundle (httpie, jq, yq, dasel, gron, miller, hq, config tools)

networkingBundle.description: Install networking bundle (ssh, nmap, curl, wget, iperf3, tcpdump, network tools)

containersBundle.description: Install containers bundle (docker, podman, k9s, kubectl, helm, dive, container tools)

utilitiesBundle.description: Install utilities bundle (git, lazygit, fd, ripgrep, database clients, system tools)

configureForRoot.description: Also configure shells for root user

installCompletions.description: Install shell completions for CLI tools

installMotd.description: Install custom Message of the Day (MOTD)

motdText.description: Custom text to display in MOTD (leave empty for default OneZero banner)

installBuildTools.description: Install build tools (build-essential, cmake, pkg-config) in utilities bundle

installDatabaseClients.description: Install database clients (postgresql, mysql, sqlite3, redis, mongodb) in web-dev bundle

installGitHubCli.description: Install GitHub CLI tools (gh, glab) in utilities bundle

installKubernetesTools.description: Install Kubernetes tools (kubectl, k9s, helm) in containers bundle

installPodman.description: Install Podman and related tools (buildah, skopeo) in containers bundle

installSshServer.description: Install OpenSSH server (security consideration) in networking bundle
